custom-meta.meta-value: Data are available from the AthenaHealth for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data. Data is restricted to ensure patient confidentiality and prevent disclosure of PHI. Data is de-deidentified, but it is athenahealthâ€™s policy to require a legal data use agreement between athena and the researcher prior to providing the data. Please reach out to Josh Gray, Vice President of athenaResearch at athenahealth: jogray@athenahealth.com.
